oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Card from Gerald Ford
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ford, Gerald R.; Hooks, Benjamin L.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A card from Gerald Ford thanking the recipient, Benjamin Hooks, for help during his presidency.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Matthew Hicks and Katie Jakovich; Donated by Patricia Hooks Gray;
